preBiofix.scouting: Scout for feeding wounds on leaders, sap dripping
preBiofix.management: Begin trapping. Pesticide applications when day temperatures reach 50F

preBiofix.phenologicalMarkers: Before  mockorange or mountain laurel bloom
preBiofix.management: Prune out and destroy drooping leaders. Cut below bark discoloration

preBiofix.scouting: Stippled older needles from previous year's population
Tap branches over white paper. If more than 10 mites/tap, apply pesticides
preBiofix.management: Spring pesticide treatment. Mites most active in cooler temperatures - 60's-70's F
preBiofix.biologicalControl: Predaceous mites - may be killed if using pesticides, lady bugs, dusty wings

preBiofix.scouting: Tap branches over white paper. If more than 10 mites/tap, apply pesticides
preBiofix.management: Fall pesticide treatment. Mites most active in cooler temperatures - 60's-70's F. Dormant oil sprays
preBiofix.biologicalControl: Predaceous mites - may be killed if using pesticides, ladybugs, dusty wings

preBiofix.scouting: Yellowish mines noticeable on underside of leaf
Hold leaves up to light to see eggs
Scout for new mines on underside of leaf
